data.name: esat
data.description: EPA's Environmental Source Apportionment Toolkit (ESAT)  python package

evidence: "The Environmental Source Apportionment Toolkit (ESAT) is an open-source software package that provides API and CLI functionality to create source apportionment workflows specifically targeting environmental datasets."
"There are many potential use cases for source apportionment in environmental science research, such as in the fields of air quality, water quality and potentially many others."

checks.reason: no binaries found in the repo
